text: The term Folly Farm may refer to: ==Buildings== ;in the United Kingdom *Folly Farm Adventure Park and Zoo, a park in Pembrokeshire, Wales *Folly Farm, Somerset, a farm and nature reserve in England *Folly Farm, Sulhamstead, a house in Berkshire, England *Folly Farm, a listed building in Lawshall, Suffolk, England *Folly Farm, Barnet, a popular recreation spot before the Second World War ;in the United States *Folly Farm, an historic house associated with the Shrine of St. Anthony (Maryland) ==Other== *Folly Farm, a book by English philosopher C. E. M. Joad
title: Folly Farm
